scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run compile:webpack && npm run copy:compiled
scripts.build: npm run build:osx && npm run build:win && npm run build:linux

linux.synopsis: Receives invoice scans from the ESRScan mobile app and displays them.

commit.message: Initial commit, imported from electron quickstart

releases.name: v0.0.3
releases.body: ### 0.0.3 (2016-01-21) #### Bug Fixes - **error-check:** Fix propType casing for ErrorCheck component ([39388eb2](https://github.com/mweibel/esrscan-desktop/commit/39388eb2)) - **travis:** - fix env variable for github token ([dddc5fad](https://github.com/mweibel/esrscan-desktop/commit/dddc5fad)) - fix travis yml syntax ([583a0725](https://github.com/mweibel/esrscan-desktop/commit/583a0725)) - fix prepare result test ([40e63f0f](https://github.com/mweibel/esrscan-desktop/commit/40e63f0f)) - fix prepare step & travis ci step ([b723ef38](https://github.com/mweibel/esrscan-desktop/commit/b723ef38)) - test output of travis tag env variable ([508322c5](https://github.com/mweibel/esrscan-desktop/commit/508322c5)) - Use remote set-url instead of adding a different remote ([cad56f9c](https://github.com/mweibel/esrscan-desktop/commit/cad56f9c)) - Ignore return code from sem release prepare ([515f4988](https://github.com/mweibel/esrscan-desktop/commit/515f4988)) - Fix shell command ([abc138f9](https://github.com/mweibel/esrscan-desktop/commit/abc138f9))

releases.name: Version 0.0.2 - Testing the deployment
releases.body: This is mainly to test if the deployment works as expected :P

releases.name: Version 0.0.1 - initial release
releases.body:
This release is feature complete but there are obviously several things to improve, mainly:
- design
- windows/linux support out of the box
